thread.title: 'Hundreds' of US Jewish graves attacked in Philadelphia
thread.title_full: 'Hundreds' of US Jewish graves attacked in Philadelphia

title: 'Hundreds' of US Jewish graves attacked in Philadelphia
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device 'Hundreds' of US Jewish graves attacked in Philadelphia 27 February 2017 Last updated at 22:01 GMT 
People have been expressing their shock at vandalism to headstones at a Jewish graveyard in Philadelphia. 
The vandalism comes less than a week after a Jewish cemetery near St Louis, Missouri, was defaced. Read more
